entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
